scripts.reset-dev: node scripts/exec.js --cmd="git push origin -d dev; git checkout -b dev main" && node scripts/exec.js --cmd="git push origin -d dev; git checkout -b dev main" --folder="/src/plugins"
scripts.rel:new: node scripts/exec.js --cmd="git checkout -b "$npm_config_branch && node scripts/exec.js --cmd="git checkout -b "$npm_config_branch --folder="/src/plugins"
